question: Why fresh egg is sink in water? / Kenapa telur segar tenggelam dalam air?
A: the egg is less dense than water / telur kurang tumpat daripada air
B: the egg is more dense than water / telur lebih tumpat daripada air

question: Why cork is float on water? / Kenapa gabus terapung pada air?
A: the cork is less dense than water / gabus kurang tumpat daripada air
B: the cork is more dense than water / gabus lebih tumpat daripada air
